Title: Category:Medicine
Content: Medicine is a branch of health science concerned with maintaining human health and restoring it by treating disease and injury it is both an area of knowledge a science of body systems and diseases and their treatment and the applied practice of that knowledge NOTE Most of the articles pertaining to the actual work and practice of medicine are located in CategoryClinical medicine and its subcategories such as CategoryMedical diagnosis and CategoryMedical treatments along with CategoryDiseases and disorders Articles pertaining to nonconventional approaches are located in CategoryAlternative medicine
